title: What We Won't Do For Love
description: The Love, Lies & Lust Series begins . . .Octavia Ellis is a sexy and independent woman who plays it safe when it comes down to relationships. She lives by one keep it strictly sexual. Octavia is living her life just the way she wants. No man. No issues. No drama. When she meets the handsome Damon Whitmore, everything changes. Octavia soon finds that Damon has become a part of her world and her heart. However, when temptation comes in the form of a sexy- hardcore thug named, Beau, Octavia finds herself caught in a deadly love triangle. She soon learns in life and love, there are no rules and sheâ€™s surprised at what she herself, will not do for love.
author: Mz. Robinson
